resources.string: Developed by Aayush Kumaria\n Designed by Ajinkya Rajkar

string.name: text_guide_3
string.u: Click Scan Now to Detect text

resources.string: Click Choose Image and choose an Image from your gallery.
If your image is visible, it can be scanned. Click Scan Now to scan the text
The text recognised in the image is displayed on your screen
You can click the Copy icon to copy the text to your clipboard
Developed by:\t Aayush Kumaria \nDesigned by:\t\t Ajinkya Rajkar
This application was created while studying BTech. Computer Science and Engineering at MIT School Of Engineering as part of our Fourth Semester Mini Project.
We got the idea of creating this application because while technology moved forward, the learning methods remained same : Copying Notes from a whiteboard and learning from it later on.
Hence the idea came, What if there was a way of capturing the text from the board by just uploading a picture.
Now, along with scanning pictures to extract notes, the application can also be used in various different scenarios.

string.name: copy_address
string.i: Click the logo to copy the address
